courses.title: Cloud & DevOps
courses.description: Master cloud computing with the AWS Solution Architect course, designed for beginners and professionals. Learn to design, implement, and manage scalable systems on AWS through expert-led training and hands-on projects. This comprehensive course covers core AWS services, architecture best practices, and security. Earn your certification with the AWS Solution Architect course and advance your career in cloud technology.
learnList: AWS Fundamentals: Cloud computing concepts and the breadth of AWS services.
Core Services Mastery: Deep dive into key infrastructure and API services (EC2, S3, IAM, RDS, Lambda, etc.).
Networking & Security: Building secure, scalable Virtual Private Clouds (VPCs).
Storage Solutions: Utilizing S3, Glacier, and EBS for various needs.
Database Management: Working with relational (RDS) and NoSQL (DynamoDB) databases, and Redshift.
Scaling & Monitoring: Implementing Auto-Scaling, Load Balancing, and CloudWatch.
Cloud Architecture: Principles for building fault-tolerant and cost-optimized solutions on AWS.

courses.title: DevOps
courses.description: Gain expertise in CI/CD pipelines, containerization, and automation tools used in modern DevOps environments.

courses.title: Power BI / Data Analysis
courses.description: Master Power BI tools to visualize, report, and analyze data, transforming insights into strategic decisions.

courses.title: Full Stack Data Science
courses.description: Learn Python, ML, and visualization techniques to become a complete Data Science professional.

courses.title: Big Data
courses.description: Dive deep into Hadoop, Spark, and Kafka technologies to process and analyze large datasets efficiently.

courses.title: Full Stack Developer
courses.description: Become a full stack developer with HTML, CSS, JS, React, Node.js, and Express.js for real-world projects.

courses.title: MERN Stack Developer
courses.description: Build full-stack web apps using MongoDB, Express, React, and Node.js — the complete MERN ecosystem.

courses.title: Full Stack Java
courses.description: Learn Java, Spring Boot, and React to build enterprise-grade, full-stack web applications.

courses.title: SQL Unix Production Support (L2)
courses.description: Develop strong database and Unix production support skills to handle enterprise-scale systems.

courses.title: Business Analyst
courses.description: Learn to analyze business needs, document processes, and bridge communication between stakeholders and dev teams.

courses.title: AR Caller RCM
courses.description: Master AR Calling and Revenue Cycle Management processes used in healthcare billing systems.

courses.title: Scrum Master
courses.description: Become a certified Scrum Master and lead agile projects effectively using Scrum methodology and tools.

courses.title: Software Testing / QA
courses.description: Learn manual and automation testing, including Selenium, API, and performance testing best practices.

courses.title: Medical Coding
courses.description: Understand ICD and CPT coding for healthcare documentation. Learn processes used in hospitals worldwide.
